attributes.action: Allow children to wear non-uniform in schools from March 8th
attributes.additional_details: This would help with clothes not accidentally getting swapped, people that can't obtain uniform online or can't afford to buy new uniforms during this tough time
attributes.background: Force all schools to allow kids to wear non-uniform in school

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Schools decide whether or not to have a school uniform, so this is a matter for individual schools not the UK Government.

You could start a petition calling for a ban on mandatory uniforms in state schools during Covid-19, if that is something you'd like to see happen.
